name: Love Escape! -the Secret of her Room
name_original: Love Escape! -the Secret of her Room
description:
You were invited to your girlfriend's room for the first time.
But, you were locked into the room for some reason!
Can you solve many tricks hidden in the room, and escape from her room!?
A surprising truth is waiting for you!

Love Escape! is a room escape game with story that contains elements of fantasy and mystery a little bit. (You can also skip the story, and enjoy only escape.)

･The stage is pretty and attractive girl's room. Not only that, but this game is very honestly and orthodox.

･The difficulty is very reasonable, so you must feel refreshed when the puzzle is solved!

･This game has a well thought-out story. As you solve tricks, a great mystery will be unveiled step by step!

･The operation is very simple, you need only to tap and swipe. Everybody can enjoy soon with "How to play guide".

･This game is Auto save. So you can play in your spare time.

･With handwriting memo function, you can note the worrisome things soon.

･Tips book help you when you can't advance.


[It is recommended for such a person]
-I love puzzles, reasoning, and solve the mystery.
-I like to have mental exercise fun.
-I want to do something at killing time.
-I also like SF and mystery.
-I like password puzzles.
-Away from the everyday, I want to excite and throb.
-I attractive to a mysterious world.
-I want to go out with a girl who has a little secret.
-I'm interested in stylish interior.
-I want to hang around the pretty room.


[The Characters]
･Rumi Kroto
The idol of this school, the class president, the president of astronomical club, and your girlfriend.
She has all of beauty, kindness, and intelligence, so she is respected from both men and women.
Her favorite food is oranges.

･Toma Nicks
The most handsome man in the school, so he is very popular among girls.
But he doesn't seem to be interested in love, He take up an ironic and unfriendly attitude to everyone.
He belongs to the astronomical club too.
He is often beside Rumi for some reason.
His favorite food is donuts.
